title: Seeing is Believing
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>MIA~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Whoa! Mari!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Huh? Why are you heading away from me? Are we playing tag?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>No. I’m just being careful around you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Why~? What’s the matter?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I heard you’re gonna take me on a helicopter ride.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, I see~ It does seem that way! Mia, have you ever been in a helicopter? And on top of that, don’t you wanna ride in a helicopter?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>In Japan, there’s a saying, “Seeing is Believing.” Mia, you have to try it! Come on! I’ll show you how beautiful Uchiura and the sea are from above!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Don’t drag me into this~~~!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
